subject: Running
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hall, the United States marathon champion, will tune up for the Olympics by running in the London Marathon on April 13. Hall will be joined by the former world-record holder Paul Tergat and the defending champion Martin Lel.
snippet: Ryan Hall, the United States marathon champion, will tune up for the Olympics by running in the London Marathon on April 13. Hall will be joined by the former world-record holder Paul Tergat and the defending champion Martin Lel.
